InterSystems Java Connectivity API

This document is the Java API specification for InterSystems Java Technologies.

See:
          Description

Packages
com.intersys Package contains helper classes with API to platform and build information.
com.intersys.cache.jni Access to Cache' Classes, Globals and Routines from Java programs.
com.intersys.classes Java representation for standard Cache Classes.
com.intersys.jdbc Cache JDBC Driver.
com.intersys.jsp JSP custom tags and tools
com.intersys.objects Public API for Java Binding.
com.intersys.objects.reflect Cache Reflection API is used for dynamic binding and obtaining metadata from Cache.
com.jalapeno Main package for InterSystems Jalapeño Technology.
com.jalapeno.annotations Package containing InterSystems Jalapeño Technology Annotations.

 

This document is the Java API specification for InterSystems Java Technologies. It includes InterSystems Jalapeño (JAva LAnguage PErsistence with NO mapping) technology that provides a way for Java developers to rapidly build database applications.

Other options to connect to Caché 5.0 or later Server from Java environment include:

  • Standard JDBC connection for SQL-based database operations.
  • Connection using Java projections of classes, defined in Cache ObjectScript.
  • "Dynamic" data connection using Cache Reflection API.
  • Generation of Entity Beans for EJB
Intersystems Corporation
